channel.title: How to make a admin spot?help please
channel.description: how do i make a admin spot? i want it in the mage arena in wildy?

item.title: How to make a admin spot?help please
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Find the case for the lever to teleport in there and change that to if (playerRights >= 2);

then if you want to teleport there do this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminhq") && playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = Xcoords; teleportToY = Ycoords sendMessage("Welcome to admin headquarters"); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminhq") && playerRights <= 1)) { sendMessage("You need to be an admin to teleport here"); }

~ i own pking

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a admin spot?help please
